# locale

**Instance Property**

The locale for formatting the date and time interval components.

## Declaration

```swift
var locale: Locale
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSLocale/autoupdatingCurrent]. If you set this property to `nil`, the formatter resets to use `autoupdatingCurrent.`

## Specifying Date Interval Format Styles

- **timeZone(_:)**: Modifies the date interval format style to use the specified time zone format.
- **calendar**: The calendar for formatting the date interval.
- **timeZone**: The time zone for formatting the date interval components.
